title: comment
name: comment
description: An comment in SK must always be related to an object.

related_object_type.description: Object type of the comments parent. Is the camelcased base class name: Document for invoice, credit_note, contact

related_object_id.description: uuid of the comments parent object.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

team_id.description: A team uuid taken from the related object. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

filter[contact_ids].title: Contact IDs
filter[contact_ids].description: Comma-separated list of contact IDs. While present, it will return comments related to the contact and all its documents.

filter[from].title: From date
filter[from].description: All objects with a date after the date. YYYY-MM-DD

filter[to].title: To date
filter[to].description: All objects with date before the date. YYYY-MM-DD

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
